result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Josiah J. NOVOTNY

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
The State moves to dismiss and read in.  The defendant plead to charges in 16 CF 193, 15 CF 658 and 15 CF 709.  Motion granted.
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for trial.
ARRAIGNMENT - 
Information filed. Copy served on defense counsel.
Not guilty pleas entered.  Jury calendar.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is set for 01-27-16 at 9:30 a.m.
Plea date is set for 04-13-16 at 3:00 p.m.
Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.
Minutes.
With condition defendant report to the City of Manitowoc Police Department for fingerprints, photographs, and identifying information within 24 hours of release.

ADDRESS INFO for Josiah J. NOVOTNY
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail,   (Effective: 12-16-2015)
Prior: Transient, Unknown, WI
Defendant's $100.00 cash bail is amended to a $100.00 personal recognizance bond.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 12-23-15 at 8:30 a.m.   Bail is set at $100.00 cash with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release.   Bail not furnished.   Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.   Copy filed.    
Minutes.

RE:  Bail jumping, on 11-16-15.
Initial appearance is set for 12-14-15 at 2:30 p.m.
